Wraps its body in soft cotton, gaining [15,30,60,SP] SHIELD and 3 DEF, then dropping cotton balls onto the 3 tiles in front of the user. BOARD_EFFECT: cotton balls inflict SLEEP for 1 second on any Pokémon that walk on it.
Fires out two beams that hit the furthest enemies, dealing [30,60,100,SP] SPECIAL to all enemies in a line.
Inflict the target with RAGE and CONFUSION for [2,SP] seconds.

Self inflict POISONNED for 3 seconds and gain [15,SP] ATK, [10,SP] DEF and 20 SPEED
Rolls over the enemies to the farthest target, dealing [40,80,150,SP]% of SPEED as SPECIAL to all enemies in the path with [50,LK]% chance to apply FLINCH for 3 seconds.
Attracts a random STEEL Pokémon to the battlefield. Click on it to add it to your bench. AP and LUCK increase your chance to attract rarer Pokémon.

ADJACENT enemies take [20,40,80,SP] SPECIAL and get BURN for 2 seconds while user quickly moves backward to a safe spot.

Drains the target's energy, dealing [200,SP]% of user ATK as SPECIAL and healing for 50% of the damage dealt. 50% of the overheal is converted to SHIELD.

Charges through the target like a drill, dealing [15,30,60,SP] TRUE and swapping position. If there's another target behind in the same direction, immediately cast the ability again on that target. Can crit by default.

Charges through the target like a drill, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and swapping position. If there's another target behind in the same direction, immediately cast the ability again on that target.
Throws [10,15,25] rocks at random enemies, each landing randomly on their target or an ADJACENT tile, each dealing [20,30,40,SP] SPECIAL.
Rolls behind the target, dealing [90,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting FLINCH for 3 seconds. If the target suffers from PARALYSIS, gain [40,SP] SHIELD.
Gain 1 ATK, 1 DEF, 1 SPE_DEF and 5 SPEED per Falinks on your team. Troopers tackle target for [20,SP] SPECIAL each.
Deal [20,40,60,SP] SPECIAL to the target.
Deals [70,SP] SPECIAL to the target and gains [30,SP] SHIELD per ADJACENT ELECTRIC Pokémon, heals [30,SP] HP per ADJACENT FAIRY Pokémon.
Spits sand at the 3 enemy Pokémon in front of the user, dealing [30,60,120,SP] SPECIAL and inflicting BLINDED for 2 seconds.

Deals [10,30,50,SP] TRUE that can break PROTECT, and dig deeper into the ground under the target, destroying any eventual buried items in the process. Double damage if target is already on a fully dug hole.

The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting 3 different low HP targets with splashes of water dealing [15,30,45,SP] SPECIAL.

Pelt the target with a storm of punches, dealing [60,SP] + 125% ATK SPECIAL and heals [40,SP] HP.
